      • diceExistOnCell

        protected boolean diceExistOnCell(Map map,
                                  Dice dice,
                                  int row,
                                  int column)
        verifies if the dice is positioned on the passed coordinates or not
        Parameters:
        map - player's map
        dice - a dice that is supposed to be on the map
        row - row's coordinate on the map where there should be the passed dice
        column - column's coordinate on the map where there should be the passed dice
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the dice is really positioned on the map, else false
